title: It's that time! Mark Time MARCH!!! [Mark's Birthday]
author: dezcom

comments.content:
That's nice, Chris, he will be happy——sì, buon compleanno Signor Simonson.  
If you remember about that, I didn't write the article yet, a nice to-do for the zero seven.

What wonderful and even delicious numbers!

Oh, Yes. And Happy Birthday!!!
Someone make Mark a real Coquette clock for his birthday. If any type designer deserves it, it's him. Happy day, MS. You are rule.

Yea, Happy Birthday, Mark. Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy.  
_(That sure makes up for christmas. :)_

Dav

I'm away this week for Christmas. I have only limited internet access and haven't been checking Typophile. Good thing I did today!

Thank you, Chris and everyone.
Ooh, if you make that clock I will buy it! Happy Birthday Mark!
Happy Belated Birthday from me too, Mark. :^)

All say: "Time goes"  
Say: No! Time stays! We go!  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Happy birthday to every one whose DOB coincides with the Great.  
Merry Christmas and Happy 2007 to All.

Happy Birthday Mark!

Forgot to check our kitchen birthady calendar, sorry'bout being late. :^/
hope it was happy, mark! can't wait to see what you have up your sleeve next.
